com.github.uberroot.ncjbot.modules

Class BasicServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.uberroot.ncjbot.modapi.AbstractModule
      • com.github.uberroot.ncjbot.modapi.RunningModule
        • com.github.uberroot.ncjbot.modules.BasicServer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Exclusive<Server>, Runner, Server

    public class BasicServer
extends RunningModule
implements Server

    A simple server to accept connections and dispatch them to session handlers.

    Author:
    Carter Waxman

    • Method Detail

      • setPort

        public void setPort(int port,
           boolean immediate)
        Description copied from interface: Server

        Sets the listening port for the server. The server must restart for this to take effect.

        Specified by:
        setPort in interface Server
        Parameters:
        port - The new port number.
        immediate - True to restart the server immediately, false to restart it manually at a later time.

      • getConfiguredPort

        public int getConfiguredPort()
        Description copied from interface: Server

        Gets the port the server is configured to use. This may be different from the actual listening port if a new port is set without restarting the server.

        Specified by:
        getConfiguredPort in interface Server
        Returns:
        The configured listening port.

      • getCurrentPort

        public int getCurrentPort()
        Description copied from interface: Server

        Gets the port that the server is currently using.

        Specified by:
        getCurrentPort in interface Server
        Returns:
        The current listening port or -1 if the server is not running.
